proofOfStillnessSubtitle: Silence is the currency. Stillness is the path
meditationConfirmText: The Universe bows to your Silence. This flow session will last 30 minutes. Read the guidance, find quiet place, sit with grace, and gently return to the Breath within.
missedSessionText: A Stillness was missed along your Sacred 41-day path. Breathe in, begin again ‚Äî Adjust your Settings to continue in Truth.
restrictDescription: You can only start a session within 10 minutes before or after your set time. Check your next session to align.
completedSessionsText: You've completed your Sacred session{plural} for today. Return tomorrow or switch to Flow.
resetDescription: The circle Resets. Are you sure you wish to Reset your 41-day Sacred Sits? All progress will be cleared, and a new Vibration must be chosen.
universeBows: The Universe bows to your Silence.
meditationInstructions: Read the guidance, find quiet place, sit with grace, and gently return to the Breath within.
durationMessage: You've Nourished your Soul for {minutes} {minuteText} of Stillness
meditationStep1: Take any comfortable sitting position on chair or mat.
meditationStep2: Practice Anulom Vilom (alternate nostril breathing) for a few minutes: Gently close your right nostril with your thumb and inhale slowly through your left nostril, then close your left nostril with ring finger and exhale through your right. Inhale through your right nostril, then switch and exhale through your left. Continue this cycle smoothly and naturally, focusing on your breath.
meditationStep3: After breathing exercise close your eyes, join your hands and cross your legs. Observe your natural Breath.
meditationStep4: If any thoughts arise bring your awareness back to your Breath.
meditationStep5: After finishing, gently place your hands over your eyes. Open your eyes slowly with a smile and feel gratitude.
phantomRedirectNotice: You are about to be redirected to the Phantom app to connect your wallet.
disconnectWalletStatsLine1: ‚Ä¢ Your Meditation stats will no longer sync to space.
disconnectWalletStatsLine3: ‚Ä¢ You can always reconnect your wallet with ease.

configstreak: Complete all daily sessions to maintain streak
endDescription: Are you sure you wish to end this session early? This time of Stillness won‚Äôt be recorded in your TrueYogi journey.

startOnChainJourneyDescriptionLine3: Configure your journey afresh to receive rewards.

walletSwitchBlockWarning: Resetting will clear all progress. You can continue with new wallet.
faq_a1: Meditation is resting in stillness and awareness, a return to our natural state of clarity, peace, and connection with the universe.
faq_a2: Meditation is essential for everyone. Regardless of who you are or what you do, make meditation a regular part of your routine to transform into the best version of yourself and awaken your true potential.
faq_q3: What is the best time to Meditate?
faq_a3: The best times are sunrise and sunset, but any quiet time works. Consistency matters more than timing.
faq_q4: How do I deal with thoughts during Meditation?
faq_a4: Thoughts are natural. Let them come and go like clouds. Watch them without resisting ‚Äîthen return focus to your Breath.
faq_q5: How can I stay consistent with Meditation?
faq_a5: Pick a regular time and place, start small, and be gentle with yourself. Daily practice, even a few minutes, builds the habit and deepens your journey.
app_faq_a1: This App combines meditation tracking with blockchain technology to create a unique spiritual journey.
app_faq_a2: The App gently tracks your meditation progress and connects with your wallet to record milestones and offer rewards through the blockchain.
app_faq_q3: What's the difference between Flow and TrueYogi?
app_faq_a3: Flow is flexible meditation anytime. TrueYogi is a structured 41-day challenge with scheduled sessions.
app_faq_q4: Why can't I start a session outside my scheduled time?
app_faq_a4: TrueYogi honors Sacred timing. Sessions begin within a 10-minute window to strengthen your discipline and presence.
app_faq_q5: Do I need crypto to use this?
app_faq_a5: No, the core meditation features work without any cryptocurrency or wallet connection.
faq_wallet_question: Do I need a wallet to use TrueYogi?
faq_wallet_21days_text: Begin freely - no wallet needed to start your sacred journey
faq_wallet_anew_desc: Like the phoenix rising, you have to start fresh
faq_wallet_anew_note: (Previous journey dissolves to make space for new beginnings)
faq_wallet_ending_quote: "Each ending births a new beginning - your practice remains eternal whether connected or free."
dapp_faq_q1: How do I connect my wallet?
dapp_faq_a1: Click the "Connect Wallet" button and approve the connection in your Phantom wallet app.
dapp_faq_q2: Why do I verify my identity daily?
dapp_faq_a2: Your identity is refreshed daily. Like a mindful breath, a daily check-in keeps your path protected and your presence recognized.
dapp_faq_a3: Your meditation data remains private until you choose to connect your wallet and verify it.
dapp_faq_a4: YOGI tokens are Spiritual rewards‚Äîsymbols of your consistent presence on the 41-day path.
dapp_faq_q5: How do I claim my YOGI tokens?
dapp_faq_a5: After completing the challenge, at Journey Complete section click "Claim YOGI Tokens". You'll need to sign a message with your wallet.
dapp_faq_q6: What happens if I disconnect my wallet?
dapp_faq_a6: Your journey continues, but token rewards pauses until your wallet reconnects and Identity is verified.
rewards_faq_intro: üåü Turn your daily Stillness into YOGI tokens. Consistency brings abundance!
rewards_faq_note1: ‚ö†Ô∏è 1 missed session = reconfigure again to continue earning

reset_confirm_description: This will reset the app to its initial state, including:
faqTokenAddressQuestion: What is the official YOGI token address?
faqTokenAddressAnswer: The official TRUE YOGI (YOGI) Token  is issued on the Solana blockchain.

For deepest Stillness and Spiritual Rewards,
continue your journey on Mobile.
Complete sessions and claim tokens using the Phantom wallet app on your phone.
mobileReminder_peaceflow: Your journey inward shapes your world outward.
desktopYogi_paragraph:
You can start and complete a 21-day challenge on desktop.

To unlock the full 41-day challenge and claim tokens, continue on your mobile device.

Flow is always available!
connectWallet_heading: You can start the 21-day challenge now. To unlock the full 41-day challenge and claim YOGI tokens, connect your wallet.
mobileRequired_paragraph:
To continue your 41-day journey beyond day 21,
please use your mobile device.
and carry your meditation with you, wherever you are.
infoSectionLine1: Once you start meditation, the timer runs until the selected duration ends.
infoSectionLine2: You may keep the app open, close it, or if you have to move about‚Äîyour session continues.
infoSectionLine3: Ending early will mark the session as incomplete.
infoSectionLine4: During the session, remember: you are meditating even if life interrupts, as long as you gently observe your breath and remain aware. Your presence is your practice.
noCertificatesMessage: Your Certificate of Stillness will appear here after you complete the TrueYogi challenge.
resetYogiConfigDescription: Use this to reset your TrueYogi challenge or start a new challenge.

To unlock the full 41-day challenge and claim tokens, connect your wallet.

Flow is always available!
wisdomWalletL1: Please connect your wallet to engage with wisdom.
wisdomWalletL2: Every ‚Äòlove‚Äô you send honors wisdom and records your presence.

Your Meditation Stats are not affected.

Are you sure you want to continue?
faqClearCacheDescription: Reload the app data to get the latest content if required. Useful for spaceship mode.
unseen_faq_q1: How do I discover deeper features?
unseen_faq_a1: TrueYogi contains layered experiences for dedicated practitioners. Explore interactive elements and meaningful gestures throughout your journey.
unseen_faq_q2: What is the Global Resonance Field?
unseen_faq_a2: A real-time visualization of collective meditation energy across the planet.
unseen_faq_a3: A continuous sacred timer representing sustained awareness across the global community.
unseen_faq_q4: How does the Earth Grid work?
unseen_faq_a4: A living network visualization where each participant becomes a node of light, with connections forming and dissolving in real-time based on simultaneous meditation activity worldwide.
unseen_faq_a5: Discover soundscapes, bells, gongs, and full musical compositions through exploration.
unseen_faq_a6: The app responds to various gestures and exploration of visual elements.
unseen_faq_a7: TrueYogi rewards patient, curious practitioners with discoveries that enhance their journey.
challengeCompleteDescription: Your meditation journey has reached its destination. You've completed the challenge from ${startDate} to ${endDate}.
